Oldsavegamestructs.h

00001 /*
00002  * Oldsavegamestructs.h
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 27.03.2010
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  *
00007  *  This file contains the old savegame-structures
00008  *  that we used back for version 0.3.0.4 and lower.
00009  *  These structures only serve for compatibility
00010  *
00011  *  NOTE: These structures are old and crappy!
00012  *  Please do never ever use them in the engine... !!!!!!
00013  */
00014 
00015 #define MAX_LEVELS     100
00016 
00017 #ifndef OLDSAVEGAMESTRUCTS_H_
00018 #define OLDSAVEGAMESTRUCTS_H_
00019 
00020 #include "../keen.h"
00021 #include "../common/Playerdefines.h"
00022 #include "../common/inventory.h"
00023 
00024 struct OldSaveGameFormatV5
00025 {
00026  struct stLevelControl
00027  {
00028   // level control
00029   int command;                 // used to give a command to playgame_levelmanager()
00030   int chglevelto;              // parameter to LVLC_CHANGE_LEVEL
00031   int tobonuslevel;            // if 1 player will warp to bonus level on return to WM (for ep1)
00032   // data about current level
00033   unsigned char curlevel;                // number of current level
00034   bool success;                // true if level was finished, 0 if he died
00035   bool gameovermode;           // true if "Game Over" is displayed
00036   bool dokeensleft;            // true if we need to do the "Keens Left"
00037   bool dark;                   // true if level is currently dark (lights are out)
00038 
00039   char episode;                 // which episode we're playing (1-3)
00040   bool hardmode;
00041   bool usedhintmb;     // Has the message box been used?
00042   int demomode;
00043 
00044   // array of which levels have been completed (have "Done" tiles over them
00045   // on the world map)
00046   bool levels_completed[MAX_LEVELS_VORTICON+1];
00047 
00048   // exitXpos: the X pixel position (not <<CSFed) of the frame of the exit
00049   // door. when walking out the door, keen's sprite will not be drawn past
00050   // this point.
00051   unsigned int level_done, level_done_timer;
00052   unsigned int level_finished_by;      // index of player that finished level
00053   unsigned int exitXpos;
00054 
00055   // for ep2: how many sparks (tantalus ray machines) are left
00056   // you must destroy the tantalus ray generator before exiting
00057   int sparks_left;
00058 
00059 
00060   // if true, a moving platform is currently extending/retracting (ep2)
00061   bool PlatExtending;
00062 
00063   // if > 0, the screen will shake and it will decrement each frame.
00064   // used when you push a switch on a tantalus ray (ep2), and Mortimer's machine
00065   int vibratetime;
00066   // if 1, then while vibrating the game will be paused
00067   char vibratepause;
00068 
00069   // as long as we only have POD
00070   stLevelControl() { memset(this, 0, sizeof(stLevelControl)); }
00071 
00072   // stuff for custom episode's options
00073   struct
00074   {
00075    char DoorOpenDir;
00076    char pShotSpeed;
00077    char VortDieDoFade;
00078    char vgatiles;
00079    char vgasprites;
00080   } cepvars;
00081  }LevelControl;
00082 
00083  unsigned long scroll_x;
00084  unsigned int scrollx_buf;
00085  unsigned char scrollpix;
00086  unsigned int mapx;
00087  unsigned int mapxstripepos;
00088  unsigned int scroll_y;
00089  unsigned int scrolly_buf;
00090  unsigned char scrollpixy;
00091  unsigned int mapy;
00092  unsigned int mapystripepos;
00093 
00094  unsigned int max_scroll_x, max_scroll_y;
00095 
00096  struct stOldMap
00097  {
00098   unsigned int xsize, ysize;            // size of the map
00099   bool isworldmap;             // if 1, this is the world map
00100   unsigned int mapdata[256][256];       // the map data
00101   // in-game, contains monsters and special object tags like for switches
00102   // on world map contains level numbers and flags for things like teleporters
00103   unsigned int objectlayer[256][256];
00104   bool firsttime;  // used when generating multiplayer positions on world map
00105 
00106   stOldMap() { memset(this, 0, sizeof(stPlayer)); }
00107  } map;
00108 
00109  struct stPlayer
00110  {
00111     // these coordinates are CSFed
00112     unsigned long x;
00113     unsigned int y;
00114 
00115     unsigned int w;
00116     unsigned int h;
00117 
00118     char isPlaying;
00119     int useObject;
00120 
00121     char godmode;
00122 
00123     // used on world map only
00124     char hideplayer;
00125     char mounted;
00126 
00127     short treshold;  // This is used for analog devices like joysticks
00128     signed int pinertia_y;
00129 
00130     unsigned long mapplayx;
00131     signed int mapplayy;
00132 
00133     unsigned char playframe;
00134 
00135     unsigned char pfalling,plastfalling,pfallspeed,pfallspeed_increasetimer;
00136 
00137     unsigned char pwalking,playspeed;
00138     unsigned char pslowingdown;
00139     unsigned char pwalkframe,pwalkframea,pwalkanimtimer;
00140     unsigned char pwalkincreasetimer, pfriction_timer_x, pfriction_timer_y;
00141     signed int pinertia_x,pboost_x;
00142     int chargedjump;
00143     unsigned char playpushed_decreasetimer;
00144     bool widejump;
00145 
00146     bool blockedl,blockedr,blockedu,blockedd;
00147     unsigned int blockedby;
00148 
00149     unsigned char pjumping, pjumptime, pjumpupspeed_decreasetimer, pjumpdir;
00150     unsigned char pjumpframe, pjumpanimtimer, pjumpupspeed;
00151     unsigned char pjumpnormaltime, pjumpupdecreaserate, pjustjumped;
00152     unsigned char pjustfell;
00153     unsigned char pjumpfloattimer;
00154 
00155     unsigned char pdir,pshowdir,lastpdir;
00156 
00157     char pfiring,pfireframetimer;
00158     char inhibitwalking, inhibitfall;
00159 
00160     int ctrltimer, alttimer;
00161     char keyprocstate;
00162     char wm_lastenterstate;
00163 
00164     char pdie, pdieframe, pdietimer;
00165     int pdietillfly;
00166     signed int pdie_xvect;
00167     int psupportingtile, psupportingobject, lastsupportingobject;
00168     char psliding;
00169     char psemisliding;
00170     bool ppogostick;
00171     int pfrozentime,pfrozenframe,pfrozenanimtimer;
00172 
00173     unsigned char keytable[50];
00174     unsigned char lastkeytable[50];
00175 
00176 
00177     // New values
00178     char playcontrol[PA_MAX_ACTIONS];
00179     char lastplaycontrol[PA_MAX_ACTIONS];
00180 
00181     char x_friction;
00182     char y_friction;
00183 
00184     // End new values
00185 
00186     unsigned char dpadcount, dpadlastcount;
00187 
00188     unsigned int ankhtime, ankhshieldobject;
00189 
00190     stInventory inventory;
00191 
00192     stPlayer() { memset(this, 0, sizeof(stPlayer)); }
00193  }Player;
00194 
00195  OldSaveGameFormatV5() { memset(this, 0, sizeof(OldSaveGameFormatV5)); }
00196 };
